Package org.vowpalwabbit.spark

Class VowpalWabbitExample

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vowpalwabbit.spark.VowpalWabbitExample
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    public class VowpalWabbitExample
extends Object
implements Closeable
    A wrapper for the native example data structure.
    Author:
    Markus Cozowicz

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the features and label.

      • addToNamespaceDense

        public void addToNamespaceDense​(char ns,
                                int baseIndex,
                                double[] values)
        Adds the dense features values to the supplied namespace. The baseIndex is expected to be pre-hashed (e.g. hash(namespace)).
        Parameters:
        ns - the first character of the namespace.
        baseIndex - the base index for each of the values.
        values - the feature values.

      • addToNamespaceSparse

        public void addToNamespaceSparse​(char ns,
                                 int[] indices,
                                 double[] values)
        Adds the sparse features values to the supplied naemspace.
        Parameters:
        ns - the first character of the namespace.
        indices - the indices of each corresponding feature value.
        values - the feature values.

      • setLabel

        public void setLabel​(float weight,
                     float label)
        Set the simple label.
        Parameters:
        weight - weight of this example.
        label - value of the label (e.g. -1, 1 for binary).

      • setMulticlassLabel

        public void setMulticlassLabel​(float weight,
                               int label)
        Set the multiclass label.
        Parameters:
        weight - weight of this example.
        label - value of the label (1-based index).

      • setCostSensitiveLabels

        public void setCostSensitiveLabels​(float[] costs,
                                   int[] classes)
        Set the csoaa label. Length of costs and classes need to match.
        Parameters:
        costs - costs for each label.
        classes - classes for this example.

      • setMultiLabels

        public void setMultiLabels​(int[] classes)
        Set the multilabel.
        Parameters:
        classes - classes for this example.

      • setContextualBanditLabel

        public void setContextualBanditLabel​(int action,
                                     double cost,
                                     double probability)
        Set a contextual bandit (CB) label
        Parameters:
        action - this is 1-based.
        cost - cost assigned to the action.
        probability - probability with which the action was chosen.

      • setSharedLabel

        public void setSharedLabel()
        Mark this as a shared CB label.

      • setDefaultLabel

        public void setDefaultLabel()
        Initializes the label.

      • learn

        public void learn()
        Updates the associated VW model using this example.

      • getPrediction

        public Object getPrediction()
        Gets the prediction from the current example. Useful after learning to get the 1-step ahead prediction.
        Returns:
        the prediction.

      • predict

        public Object predict()
        Gets the prediction from the current example.
        Returns:
        the prediction.
